comments.en:
Special japanese printer driver.

This driver is a candidate for being marked obsolete with Gutenprint as recommended replacement.

This driver was not maintained any more for longer time and is broken in current Ghostscript. Please use Gutenprint for these printers. The Epson Stylus Color 200 is not (yet) listed as supported by Gutenprint. Please try similar models, and if nothing works, try similar models with the "stcolor" driver. If you have found a suitable driver, preferably one which we did not mark as obsolete, please tell us by reporting a bug on our bug tracking system. Choose "OpenPrinting" as product and "foomatic-db" as component.
